responses: Hi there, how can I help?
I can give you information regarding PEC (Punjab Engineering College)
Offering support and information about PEC (Punjab Engineering College)

patterns: Who is the director of pec?
who is director of Punjab Engineering College
responses: The Punjab Engineering College (Deemed to be University) is led by Director, Prof. Dheeraj Sanghi

patterns: what is the rating of PEC?
what is Punjab Engineering College Rank?
responses: According to the recent National Institutional Ranking Framework report by MHRD, GOI, PEC was ranked 38 among all the engineering institutes in India.

Monte Ahuja (1967 - Mechanical ): Monte Ahuja is a self-made entrepreneur, philanthropist, avid golfer, and consummate family man. He graduated from PEC in 1967 (mechanical) and from Ohio State University in 1970 with a Master's Degree in Mechanical Engineering.
Jaspal Singh Bhatti (1978-Electrical) : Jaspal Singh Bhatti (3 March 1955 – 25 October 2012) was an Indian television personalityfamous for his satirical take on the problems of the common man
Kaplana Chawla :First Indian woman in space. She completed her Bachelor of Engineering degree in Aeronautical Engineering at Punjab Engineering College at Chandigarhin 1982.

Vanya Mishra :Vanya Mishra (born 27 February 1992) in Chandigarh was crowned the winner of Femina Miss India on March 30, 2012.She has completed her graduate programme in electrical engineering from PEC University of Technology in 2014.She was a member of Projection Design Club (PDC) in the college

patterns: what is punjab Engineering College Website

responses: Punjab Engineering College (Deemed to be University), Sector 12, Chandigarh, 160012

patterns: what are the progrmmes offers in pec?
what are course offerd in Pec
responses: The Punjab Engineering College (Deemed to be University), Chandigarh offers four-year Bachelor degree programmes in Aerospace Engineering, Civil Engineering, Computer Science and Engineering, Electrical Engineering, Electronics and Communication Engineering, Mechanical Engineering, Materials and Metallurgical Engineering, Production and Industrial Engineering. Master of Technology is offered in Civil Engineering (Transportation Engineering), Civil Engineering (Water Resources Engineering), Civil Engineering (Structural Engineering), Civil Engineering (Environmental Engineering) – an interdisciplinary programme, Computer Science and Engineering, Computer Science and Engineering (Information Security) – a self-supporting programme, Electrical Engineering, Electronics Engineering (VLSI Design), Mechanical Engineering, Industrial Materials and Metallurgy, Production and Industrial Engineering, Total Quality Engineering and Management - a self-supporting, interdisciplinary programme and Industrial Design - a self-supporting, interdisciplinary programme. Visite https://www.pec.ac.in/programmes for more information
